1.0.name: wordpress/shopp-wufoo
1.0.description:
This plugin integrates Shopp with Wufoo.

After checkout, a customer's first name, last name, and email will be added to a specified form on Wufoo. This process occurs in the background without needing action from the user.

With Shopp + Wufoo you no longer need to enter this information in manually. It is done automatically with each order.

Recommendations

  • Need help with your Shopp ecommerce store? Hire a Shopp consultant today.
  • View additional WordPress plugins for Shopp by Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC
  • Follow Lorenzo on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn
